summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 discussing concerns about harassment from QAnon conspiracy theorists following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest. The correspondence involves individuals seeking information about whether the FBI is investigating QAnon and reporting online harassment involving their families.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the person whose arrest triggered increased activity and concern from the email sender.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's arrest is referenced as an event that caused things to 'rev up' and increased concerns about conspiracy theories.

keyFacts: The email chain discusses harassment from QAnon conspiracy theorists following Epstein's arrest.
The sender reports receiving violent messages daily and expresses concern for family safety.
The correspondence mentions efforts to remove videos from YouTube that included pictures of the sender's baby.
The email references 'Pizza Gate' as another conspiracy theory of concern.
The document shows how Epstein's case intersected with online conspiracy theories and harassment campaigns.
